Docs.summary: Used if the name is written in Hanzi/Kanji/Hanja and we could not determine which specific language it belongs to: Chinese, Japanese or Korean.

remarks.para: Used if the name is written in Hanzi/Kanji/Hanja and we could not determine which specific language it belongs to: Chinese, Japanese or Korean.
